devdoc.author: @apoorvlathey
devdoc.details: This Zap must be excluded from vault fees in both NFTX v2 & v3.

owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

renounceOwnership().details: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions anymore. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby removing any functionality that is only available to the owner.

transferOwnership(address).details: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.

v2InventoryToXNFT(uint256,uint256,bool,u.details: Must give xToken approval before calling this function

v2VaultToXNFT(address,uint256,bool,uint2.details: Must give v2 VToken approval before calling this function

devdoc.title: NFTX Migrator Zap

sushiToNFTXAMM((address,uint256,address,.notice: Migrates liquidity from Sushiswap to NFTX AMM

v2InventoryToXNFT(uint256,uint256,bool,u.notice: Move vTokens from v2 Inventory to v3 Inventory (minting xNFT)

v2VaultToXNFT(address,uint256,bool,uint2.notice: Move v2 vTokens to v3 Inventory (minting xNFT)

userdoc.notice: Migrates positions from NFTX v2 to v3
